column1: [Pacers] Injury Update for tonight's game: Goga Bitadze - Out (right ankle), Brian Bowen II - Out (groin), Jeremy Lamb - Out (left knee), Jalen Lecque - Out (left ankle), T.J. McConnell - Out (personal reasons), Victor Oladipo - Out (injury management), T.J. Warren - Out (left foot)
[Timberwolves] NEWS: @Timberwolves Waive Brian Bowen II, Matt Lewis, Isaiah Miller and Chris Silva
